AT.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
AT.description: Deine Lieblingscharaktere aus dem Megaman Battle Network-Universum sind wieder da, um einen Sieger im Battle Chip Grand Prix zu bestimmen! Tritt gegen mehrere Gegner an, um den ultimativen Preis zu gewinnen: ein besonders seltener Battle Chip! Befehlige deinen Net Navi, indem du Battle Chips mit verschiedenen Elementen nutzt: Feuer, Wasser, Elektrizität oder Holz. Wähle deine Battle Chips geschickt, abhängig von der Beschaffenheit in der Arena. Metall unterstützt elektrische Angriffe, während Gras sie schwächt. Außer im Grand Prix kannst du ebenso in einzelnen Gefechten kämpfen oder dein eigenes Turnier erstellen!

AU.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
AU.description: Your favourite characters from the Megaman Battle Network universe are back, to duke it out in the Battle Chip Grand Prix! Face multiple opponents on your way to the ultimate prize: an extremely rare Battle Chip! Command your Net Navi using Battle Chips of various elemental types: fire, water, electricity or wood. Choose your Battle Chips wisely, depending on the material in the arena; metal aids electric attacks, while grass weakens them. As well as the Grand Prix, you can also battle in one-off bouts or create your own tournament!

BG.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
BG.description: Your favourite characters from the Megaman Battle Network universe are back, to duke it out in the Battle Chip Grand Prix! Face multiple opponents on your way to the ultimate prize: an extremely rare Battle Chip! Command your Net Navi using Battle Chips of various elemental types: fire, water, electricity or wood. Choose your Battle Chips wisely, depending on the material in the arena; metal aids electric attacks, while grass weakens them. BE.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
BE.description: Vos personnages préférés de l'univers Megaman Battle Network sont de retour, prêts à en découdre pour le Battle Chip Grand Prix ! Affrontez de nombreux adversaires et tentez de remporter le prix ultime : une Battle Chip d'une rareté extrême ! Contrôlez votre Net Navi et utilisez des Battle Chips aux éléments variés : feu, eau, électricité ou bois. Choisissez-les avec précaution, en fonction de l'équipement de l'arène ; le métal facilite les attaques électriques, tandis que l'herbe les affaiblit. En plus du Grand Prix, vous pouvez également affronter d'autres adversaires en duel ou créer votre propre tournoi !

ES.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
ES.description: ¡Tus personajes favoritos del universo Megaman Battle Network han vuelto para repartir tortas en el Battle Chip Grand Prix! Enfréntate a diferentes adversarios en tu camino al gran premio: un Battle Chip extremadamente raro. Dirige a tus Net Navi usando Battle Chips de varios tipos de elementos: fuego, agua, electricidad o madera. Escoge muy bien tus Battle Chips teniendo en cuenta el material que haya en el tablero. Así, por ejemplo, el metal ayuda a los ataques eléctricos, mientras que la hierba los debilita. Además de en el Grand Prix, tienes la posibilidad de luchar en combates únicos o de crear tus propios campeonatos.

IT.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
IT.description: I tuoi personaggi preferiti dell'universo di Megaman Battle Network sono tornati per affrontarsi nel Battle Chip Grand Prix! Scontrati con diversi nemici mentre cerchi di ottenere il premio più ambito: un Battle Chip estremamente raro! Guida il tuo Net Navi usando Battle Chip di diversi elementi: fuoco, acqua, elettricità e legno. Scegli attentamente il Battle Chip in base al materiale presente nell'arena: il metallo rende più efficaci gli attacchi elettrici, mentre l'erba li indebolisce. Oltre al Grand Prix, puoi anche combattere in scontri unici o creare il tuo torneo personale!

NL.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
NL.description: Je favoriete personages uit het Megaman Battle Network-universum zijn terug, klaar om helemaal los te gaan in de Battle Chip Grand Prix! Versla verschillende tegenstanders om uiteindelijk de ultieme prijs in de wacht te slepen: de ultra-zeldzame Battle Chip! Bestuur je Net Navi met behulp van Battle Chips van verschillende typen elementen: vuur, water, elektriciteit of hout. Denk goed na en stem je Battle Chip af op het materiaal waaruit het strijdtoneel is opgebouwd; metaal ondersteunt elektro-aanvallen terwijl gras ze juist afzwakt. Naast dat je kunt strijden in de Grand Prix kun je ook je krachten meten in enkele gevechten of je eigen toernooi creëren!

NZ.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
NZ.description: Your favourite characters from the Megaman Battle Network universe are back, to duke it out in the Battle Chip Grand Prix! Face multiple opponents on your way to the ultimate prize: an extremely rare Battle Chip! Command your Net Navi using Battle Chips of various elemental types: fire, water, electricity or wood. Choose your Battle Chips wisely, depending on the material in the arena; metal aids electric attacks, while grass weakens them. PL.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
PL.description: Your favourite characters from the Megaman Battle Network universe are back, to duke it out in the Battle Chip Grand Prix! Face multiple opponents on your way to the ultimate prize: an extremely rare Battle Chip! Command your Net Navi using Battle Chips of various elemental types: fire, water, electricity or wood. Choose your Battle Chips wisely, depending on the material in the arena; metal aids electric attacks, while grass weakens them. PT.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
PT.description: Os teus personagens favoritos do universo Megaman Battle Network estão de volta para disputarem o Battle Chip Grand Prix! Luta contra vários inimigos até alcançares o grande prémio: um Battle Chip extremamente raro! Comanda o teu Net Navi utilizando Battle Chips de vários tipos de elementos: fogo, água, eletricidade ou madeira. Escolhe cuidadosamente os teus Battle Chips, tendo em conta o material da arena: por exemplo, o metal ajuda os ataques elétricos, enquanto a relva os enfraquece. Para além do Grand Prix, também podes lutar em combates únicos ou criar o teu próprio campeonato!

RU.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge
RU.description: Любимые герои из Megaman Battle Network возвращаются, чтобы помериться силами в Battle Chip Grand Prix (гран-при Боевого жетона)! Сражайтесь с великим множеством противников за главный приз — редчайший боевой жетон! Управляйте сетевым флотом Net Navi с помощью жетонов различных стихий: огня, воды, электричества или дерева. При выборе жетона учитывайте материал арены: металл усиливает электрические атаки, а трава, наоборот, их ослабляет. Поучаствовав в гран-при, вы также можете испытать себя в режиме поединков или организовать собственный турнир!

SE.name: Megaman Battle Chip Challenge

Face multiple opponents on your way to the ultimate prize: an extremely rare Battle Chip! Command your Net Navi using Battle Chips of various elemental types: fire, water, electricity or wood.
